subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch and Kevin Harvick were fined $25,000 apiece and put on probation through June 15 by Nascar for their fight on pit road after the Sprint Cup race on Saturday.
snippet: Kyle Busch and Kevin Harvick were fined $25,000 apiece and put on probation through June 15 by Nascar for their fight on pit road after the Sprint Cup race on Saturday.
